settings.title: How much do you charge for shipping?
When will my order arrive?
settings.answer:
Most orders will be delivered 3-7 business days

Due to significant shipping volumes your order may experience delays in delivery.

settings.title: How can I track my order?
settings.answer: Click here to track your order

settings.title: Where is my order confirmation email?
settings.answer: Typically, you will receive an Email within 1 hour of placing the order. In some cases, it can take up to 24 hours for an order confirmation Email to arrive because orders are passed through fraud and ID security checks after the order is placed.

settings.title: Signature upon delivery of my order?
settings.answer: Someone at the shipping address must sign for the order

settings.title: Where do you ship?
settings.answer: At the moment, we only ship to the US and Canada

settings.title: Accepted form of payment?
settings.answer: We accept Visa, Paypal, Apple Pay, Mastercard and Google Pay

settings.title: Time of billing?
settings.answer: You will be charged after making a purchase on our online store

settings.title: Can I change the shipping location after my order has been shipped?
How does pre-order work?
settings.answer: When a product is listed as Pre-Order, the product is not yet in stock but is available to purchase. You will not be charged until the item ships. We will provide you with an approximate ship date for your item(s) at the time of purchase. Please be aware that Pre-Order dates are approximate and subject to change. We will contact you if the ship date changes.

settings.title: Refunds
settings.answer: Please allow 3-5 business days after the refund is issued for it to appear on your issuing bank statement.
